bib.title: Multi-Objective parameter-less population pyramid for solving industrial process planning problems
bib.author: Przewozniczek, Michal Witold and Dziurzanski, Piotr and Zhao, Shuai and Indrusiak, Leandro Soares
bib.abstract: Evolutionary methods are effective tools for obtaining high-quality results when solving hard practical problems. Linkage learning may increase their effectiveness. One of the state-of-the-art methods that employ linkage learning is the Parameter-less Population Pyramid (P3). P3 is dedicated to solving single-objective problems in discrete domains. Recent research shows that P3 is highly competitive when addressing problems with so-called overlapping blocks, which are typical for practical problems. In this paper, we consider a multi-objective
